summary:
	Experienced practitioner of Enterprise Architecture with global experience in driving BSS Transformations at leading Telecom Service Providers.
	Mastery in translating high level Telecom Billing requirement into cost effective, modular and flexible Technical and Functional Design with minimum customization.
	Strong Technical expertise in Telecom B2B and B2C transformation programs.
	Stakeholder management skills to form and maintain positive relationship contributing to successful project objective.

profile_positions.description:
Solution Designer for B2B Billing project with a focus on simplifying the current complexities and challenges. Contribute towards faster time to market Billing solutions to improve the customer experience. Leading B2B RBM team as Dev-Ops lead. Delivered important project like, TOM.SOP, KabelNoord and fUPC CCS customer migration, Belastingdienst, EDR, COM. The Responsibilities cover; 
•	Owned and drafted the simplest possible Billing solution designs using RBM OOB functionalities with minimum customization.
•	Formulated Billing Technical design covering Billing Platform upgrade and Re-homing impact analysis and Cutover Strategy. 
•	Proficient in handling multi-site teams (Netherlands, Mumbai) in different time zones (IST and CET) and co-ordination with multiple stakeholders.
•	Conducted Business workshops to do fit gap and requirement analysis.
•	Owned Billing Solution Design for Migration Customer model, New Interface(s), Billing Invoice presentation, New product line configuration and Telecom Legal regulatory changes. 
•	Developed Technical framework to improve Monthly Bill Run time with impressive 60% performance improvement.
profile_positions.title: Solution Designer

profile_positions.description:
E2E designer for AltiBox (subsidiary of the Lyse Group) BSS transformation of Residential and Business End Customers, distributed across 37 AltiBox Partners in Norway and Denmark. The E2E solution build on Infonova R6 COTS product with responsibilities;
•	Drafted the BSS Transformation E2E Solution based on SID and eTOM processes build on Infonova R6 COTS product using standards OOB functionalities with minimum customization.
•	Design Customer Order management, Leads, Campaign, Top-up, Port IN-OUT functionalities integrated with internal as well as external interfaces like EAI (Wildfly), BI, NMS, ERP, Knowledge Management, OSS, IAM, GeoData, Altisalg, SF, Bank, Credit check, Bring, ATM, Print Vendor.
•	Partner Billing design covering Billing, Rating, Payment and Dunning functionalities
•	Integration of BSS solution with Remedy to Raise, Update and track incident in Remedy via R6 providing seamless user experience to desk agents and Business users.
profile_positions.title: End-To-End Designer
Solution Designer, Migration Technical Design

profile_positions.description:
Work on various BT projects covering Billing Solution, Migration and Revenue Assurance area with responsibilities;
•	Own Migration Design with complete Data Load solution framework for Harlequins Customers data migration with source data Transformation, Enrichment and Target Application order of API call. 
•	Drafted Solution Design for Product company to develop custom API.
•	Revenue Assurance analysis and identification of BT Consumer hot spot where potential Revenue leakage is identified. Develop Report with data, get it approved and prepare Strategic Solution Design.
profile_positions.title: Solution Design, Migration Design, Revenue Assurance Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Tech Lead for Geneva Horizontal, A convergent billing platform designed for BT Wholesale and BT Retail Billing Operations integrated with COTS product – Geneva (a Billing System supplied by Convergys) with responsibilities;
•	Lead and Develop integrated Billing Product, Price and Tariff platform (MBPT) for BT Retail and Wholesale. Also Develop Deployment Tool (AutoPRB) for Billing Product Configuration (Master entries).
•	Develop and Implement Continuous Integration concept with Auto Build-Test-Deploy for BT wholesale deliverables with TDD and Code Coverage matrix.
•	Experience working in Agile delivery methodologies.
•	Own Component Design for Billing Interface.
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead, Component Design
Developer, Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed signature-scanning module for storing and retrieval of account holder signature.
•	Developed Y2K conversion module and implement it at various national banks.
profile_positions.title: Developer
